record.dc:title: 22MU4b, 15MU4b, Muhlenberg County, Kentucky. Ashby Site. Features # 2.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Kentucky Adena and Woodland Mound Sites
record.wpa:narrative: Feature #2, MU4b, a roughly circular area of 73 sandstone pebbles at the juncture of the undisturbed soil and the mound fill. There was no charcoal with this area, hence its being a fireplace is doubtful.
